name: Watch_Dogs 2 Dedsec Dating Operating System DEMO
name_original: Watch_Dogs 2 Dedsec Dating Operating System DEMO
description:
Demo/Proof of Concept for Watch_Dogs 2 Dedsec Dating Operating System, a fan-created Watch Dogs dating sim

Includes:

_Story intro

_1 date with Marcus

_2 hacking mini-games

_Pick your pronouns (he/she/they)

_Manual save system

_Gallery with unlockable game art

_Play with mouse, gamepad, or re-mappable keyboard controls
